verses.text_plain: At this also my heart trembleth, and is moved out of his place.
verses.verse_html: 1At this also my heart trembleth, and is moved out of his place.

verses.text_plain: Hear attentively the noise of his voice, and the sound that goeth out of his mouth.
verses.verse_html:
2Hear attentively the noise of his voice, and the sound that goeth out of his mouth. ▼
▼ Hear…: Heb. Hear in hearing

footnotes.body_html: ▼ Hear…: Heb. Hear in hearing

verses.text_plain: He directeth it under the whole heaven, and his lightning unto the ends of the earth.
verses.verse_html:
3He directeth it under the whole heaven, and his lightning unto the ends of the earth. ▼
▼ lightning: Heb. light
 , ▼
▼ ends: Heb. wings

verses.text_plain: After it a voice roareth: he thundereth with the voice of his excellency; and he will not stay them when his voice is heard.
verses.verse_html: 4After it a voice roareth: he thundereth with the voice of his excellency; and he will not stay them when his voice is heard.

verses.text_plain: God thundereth marvellously with his voice; great things doeth he, which we cannot comprehend.
verses.verse_html: 5God thundereth marvellously with his voice; great things doeth he, which we cannot comprehend.

verses.text_plain: For he saith to the snow, Be thou on the earth; likewise to the small rain, and to the great rain of his strength.
verses.verse_html:
6For he saith to the snow, Be thou on the earth; likewise to the small rain, and to the great rain of his strength. ▼
▼ likewise…: Heb. and to the shower of rain, and to the showers of rain of his strength

footnotes.body_text: ▼ likewise…: Heb. and to the shower of rain, and to the showers of rain of his strength
footnotes.body_html: ▼ likewise…: Heb. and to the shower of rain, and to the showers of rain of his strength

verses.text_plain: He sealeth up the hand of every man; that all men may know his work.
verses.verse_html: 7He sealeth up the hand of every man; that all men may know his work.

verses.text_plain: Then the beasts go into dens, and remain in their places.
verses.verse_html: 8Then the beasts go into dens, and remain in their places.

verses.text_plain: Out of the south cometh the whirlwind: and cold out of the north.
verses.verse_html:
9Out of the south cometh the whirlwind: and cold out of the north. ▼
▼ south: Heb. chamber
 , ▼
▼ north: Heb. scattering winds

footnotes.body_html: ▼ north: Heb. scattering winds

verses.text_plain: By the breath of God frost is given: and the breadth of the waters is straitened.
verses.verse_html: 10By the breath of God frost is given: and the breadth of the waters is straitened.

verses.text_plain: Also by watering he wearieth the thick cloud: he scattereth his bright cloud:
verses.verse_html:
11Also by watering he wearieth the thick cloud: he scattereth his bright cloud: ▼
▼ his…: Heb. the cloud of his light

footnotes.body_text: ▼ his…: Heb. the cloud of his light
footnotes.body_html: ▼ his…: Heb. the cloud of his light

verses.text_plain: And it is turned round about by his counsels: that they may do whatsoever he commandeth them upon the face of the world in the earth.
verses.verse_html: 12And it is turned round about by his counsels: that they may do whatsoever he commandeth them upon the face of the world in the earth.

verses.text_plain: He causeth it to come, whether for correction, or for his land, or for mercy.
verses.verse_html:
13He causeth it to come, whether for correction, or for his land, or for mercy. ▼
▼ correction: Heb. a rod

footnotes.body_html: ▼ correction: Heb. a rod

verses.text_plain: Hearken unto this, O Job: stand still, and consider the wondrous works of God.
verses.verse_html: 14Hearken unto this, O Job: stand still, and consider the wondrous works of God.

verses.text_plain: Dost thou know when God disposed them, and caused the light of his cloud to shine?
verses.verse_html: 15Dost thou know when God disposed them, and caused the light of his cloud to shine?

verses.text_plain: Dost thou know the balancings of the clouds, the wondrous works of him which is perfect in knowledge?
verses.verse_html: 16Dost thou know the balancings of the clouds, the wondrous works of him which is perfect in knowledge?

verses.text_plain: How thy garments are warm, when he quieteth the earth by the south wind?
verses.verse_html: 17How thy garments are warm, when he quieteth the earth by the south wind?

verses.text_plain: Hast thou with him spread out the sky, which is strong, and as a molten looking glass?
verses.verse_html: 18Hast thou with him spread out the sky, which is strong, and as a molten looking glass?

tokens.text: Hast thou with him spread out

verses.text_plain: Teach us what we shall say unto him; for we cannot order our speech by reason of darkness.
verses.verse_html: 19Teach us what we shall say unto him; for we cannot order our speech by reason of darkness.

verses.text_plain: Shall it be told him that I speak? if a man speak, surely he shall be swallowed up.
verses.verse_html: 20Shall it be told him that I speak? if a man speak, surely he shall be swallowed up.

tokens.text: surely he shall be swallowed up

verses.text_plain: And now men see not the bright light which is in the clouds: but the wind passeth, and cleanseth them.
verses.verse_html: 21And now men see not the bright light which is in the clouds: but the wind passeth, and cleanseth them.

verses.text_plain: Fair weather cometh out of the north: with God is terrible majesty.
verses.verse_html:
22Fair weather cometh out of the north: with God is terrible majesty. ▼
▼ Fair…: Heb. Gold

verses.text_plain: Touching the Almighty, we cannot find him out: he is excellent in power, and in judgment, and in plenty of justice: he will not afflict.
verses.verse_html: 23Touching the Almighty, we cannot find him out: he is excellent in power, and in judgment, and in plenty of justice: he will not afflict.

verses.text_plain: Men do therefore fear him: he respecteth not any that are wise of heart.
verses.verse_html: 24Men do therefore fear him: he respecteth not any that are wise of heart.
